columns.name: _inPiece
columns.description: Reference to the Piece this Item or Piece is contained in

columns.name: _ofProduct
columns.description: Reference to the Product describing the Item

columns.name: _dimensions
columns.description: Dimensions details

columns.name: _itemQuantity
columns.description: Quantity of the item when applicable; with associated units of measure

columns.name: _productionCountry
columns.description: Production country details. Refer ISO 3166-2

columns.name: _targetCountry
columns.description: Item target country. Refer ISO 3166-2

columns.name: _unitPrice
columns.description: Product price per unit in the base

columns.name: _weight
columns.description: Weight of the item

columns.name: _emergencyContact
columns.description: Contains the Emergency contact name (e.g. the name of the agency) and phone number (min required)

columns.name: _netWeightMeasure
columns.description: The total net weight of dangerous goods transported of this line item. For air transport the value must be the volume or mass in each package.

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _externalReferences
columns.description: References to all associated ExternalReferences

columns.name: _attachedIotDevices
columns.description: References to all connected IotDevices

columns.name: _otherIdentifiers
columns.description: Details about any other identifier; depending on the context of use

columns.name: _batchNumber
columns.description: Production batch number / reference

columns.name: _expiryDate
columns.description: Product expiry date - e.g. for perishables goods or goods with programmed obsolescence

columns.name: _lotNumber
columns.description: Production lot number / reference

columns.name: _productionDate
columns.description: Production date

columns.name: _quantityForUnitPrice
columns.description: Product quantity for unit price - e.g. 12 (eggs for one USD 1)

columns.name: _reportableQuantity
columns.description: Reportable quantities; To and from the USA only

columns.name: _supplementaryInfoPrefix
columns.description: Additional information that may be added in addition to the proper shipping name to more fully describe the goods or to identify a particular condition

columns.name: _supplementaryInfoSuffix
columns.description: Additional information that may be added in addition to the proper shipping to more fully describe the goods or to identify a particular condition

columns.name: _events
columns.description: Events object

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: _involvedInActions
columns.description: References to the Actions the object is involved in
